articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: How to watch Hungary vs Portugal in Euro 2020 from India? - Goal.com
articles.description: The 10 South American countries participating in the 2021 Copa America will be split up into two groups of five. The top four in each group will advance to the single-elimination knockout stage, which kicks off with the quarterfinals.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Soccer-Messi free kick not enough as Argentina held to draw by Chile - The Star Online
articles.description: RIO DE JANEIRO (Reuters) -Argentina's Lionel Messi scored one of his trademark free kicks in the first half but Eduardo Vargas equalised for Chile in the second to leave honours even at 1-1 in their Copa America opener in Rio de Janeiro on Monday.
